Our mission Competitive Advantage.

The Right Connections

BC has business connections and network across the developed world, and from that network we will place the right talent with the necessary skills to the right project all with the goal of ensuring your sustainable, long-term success. Through those connections we will also offer quality solutions to our clients.

The Right Choice

Recognizing that business development is a business of people and their relationships as much as technical expertise and its application, Bayraktar Consultants goal is to cultivate those business values of trust, reliability, and professionalism that form the foundation of successful business relationships and business development. The right choice results in the right conclusion and in choosing BC, you are making the right choice.

The Right Future

Innovation in creation, flexibility in execution, and sustainability for the future, we recognize that as your business expands, your business needs will change also and we welcome change as we know that no continual success occurs without continual improvement.

Vision.
 Drive.
Experience.

Bayraktar Consultants’ mission is to help companies grow and create competitive advantage to achieve their business objectives in their chosen sectors. To assist companies in their business objectives, Bayraktar Consultants provides professional services, consultancy, and business development. Professional services include support during the tender proposal process with the goal of successful bids, identifying key growth areas and business strategies, acting as liaison between companies and the client, and helping companies navigate governmental and private entity requirements in the Middle East.

Recognizing that business development is a business of people and their relationships as much as technical expertise, Bayraktar Consultants goal is to cultivate those business values of trust, reliability, and professionalism that form the foundation of successful business relationships and business development.

From the President and Owner

Thank you so much for visiting our website! We are a young, dynamic, and talented boutique Consultant company for international clients. We strongly believe each client is unique, no one size fits all and we value each and every project we undertake on and always try to create something different in offering professional service to our clients. We are also very lucky to work with a great team who are able to help take your project to the next level as your success breeds success.

While establishing our company, we recognized that the Middle East is very dynamic, culturally rich, and open to almost every newly emerging trends in business development. We help our clients do the right things not only in business relationships but also in business execution because we know that success is in the details and that approach helps set us apart.

Any successful project is a team effort, a combination and collaboration of individual talents all aligned in the same direction in the service of our clients. There is no success without challenge and we hope to share that challenge and success with you in the future.
